questions.quote: I've tried. We don't have it. But maybe the two of us, working together at full capacity, could do the job of one normal man.
Now listen Roy, tell me something. When, are you gettin' out of here?
They talk back. They go, "Hey George, how's it going?" I say, "Get the hell out of here!"
Well, we've tried to arrange a situation where we'll be able to do this once in a while and still be friends.
Let me in, it's me.  Here. You don't know what this is costing me.
What am I scared of? I'm scared of the same thing that you are, everything! Why don't you just use your own name?
You need some professional advice. Why don't you go see Elaine's friend? She's a therapist.
Told me you had a great time! Said you'd call me the next day.
This is it, Jerry! This is it! He is such an incredible person! He's real, he's honest, he's unpretentious...oh, I'm really lucky!
George, what we have is too important. We can work through this.
